## Quick Start

### Local Development

```bash
# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Run tests
pytest
```

### Docker Build

```bash
# Build the Docker image
docker build -t test-flask-app:latest .

# Run the container
docker run -p 5000:5000 test-flask-app:latest
```
